name: Ludo Awesome
description:
Ludo is a timeless board game that has been enjoyed by families and friends for generations. The objective of the game is to move all your pieces from the starting point to the finish line before your opponents. The game is played with 2 to 4 players and each player gets 4 pieces that they need to move around the board according to the rolls of the dice. The player who successfully moves all their pieces to the finish line first is the winner.

The game is easy to learn and suitable for players of all ages. Roll the dice and move your pieces strategically to outsmart your opponents. With its simple rules and endless possibilities, Ludo is guaranteed to provide hours of fun and entertainment. Whether you're playing with friends or family, Ludo is a classic game that is sure to bring people together. So why wait? Download the game and start playing today!

There are so many unique things in this game from other similar games such as you see detailed statistics at the end of the match such as who got most sixes , who killed most tokens in the game etc, you can also select your favourite color at your side of screen.
